carousel.name: Money heist
carousel.description:
Eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the
Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates
the police to carry out his plan.

carousel.name: Squid Games
carousel.description:
Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange
invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting
prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

carousel.name: Kota Factory
carousel.description:
In a city of coaching centers known to train
India’s finest collegiate minds, an earnest but unexceptional
student and his friends navigate campus life.

carousel.name: You
carousel.description:
A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive
young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself
into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

trend.title: The Queen's Gambit
trend.content: In a 1950s orphanage, a young girl reveals an astonishing talent for chess and begins an unlikely journey to stardom while grappling with addiction.

trend.title: The Crown
trend.content: This drama follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

trend.title: Dark
trend.content: A missing child sets four families on a frantic hunt for answers as they unearth a mind-bending mystery that spans three generations.

trend.title: Breaking Bad
trend.content: A terminally ill chemistry teacher teams with a former student to manufacture crystal meth to secure his family's future.

trend.title: Suits
trend.content: When he impresses a big lawyer with his razor-sharp mind, a college dropout scores a coveted associate job, even though he has no legal credentials.

original.title: Luis Miguel - The Series
original.content: This series dramatizes the life story of Mexican superstar singer Luis Miguel, who has captivated audiences in Latin America and beyond for decades.

original.title: Lucifer
original.content: Bored with being the Lord of Hell, the devil relocates to Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and forms a connection with a homicide detective.

original.title: Haunted: Latin America
original.content: Real people's terrifying tales of the chilling, unexplained and paranormal come to life with dramatic reenactments in this reality series.

original.title: Who killed Sara?
original.content: Hell-bent on exacting revenge and proving he was framed for his sister's murder, Álex sets out to unearth much more than the crime's real culprit.

original.title: Cobra Kai
original.content: Decades after the tournament that changed their lives, the rivalry between Johnny and Daniel reignites in this sequel to the Karate Kid films.

original.title: Elite
original.content: When three working-class teens enroll in an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

original.title: Transformers: War for Cybertron: Siege
original.content: As the Autobots and Decepticons ravage their planet in a brutal civil war, two iconic leaders emerge in the Transformers universe's origin story.

original.title: The Umbrella Academy
original.content: Reunited by their father's death, estranged siblings with extraordinary powers uncover shocking family secrets -- and a looming threat to humanity.

original.title: Haunted: Latin America
original.content: Real people's terrifying tales of the chilling, unexplained and paranormal come to life with dramatic reenactments in this reality series.

rating.title: Stranger Things
rating.content: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

rating.title: You
rating.content: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

rating.title: Squid Game
rating.content: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

rating.title: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
rating.content: A robot apocalypse put the brakes on their cross-country road trip. Now it’s up to the Mitchells — the world’s weirdest family — to save the human race.

rating.title: Money Heist
rating.content: Eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates the police to carry out his plan.

rating.title: Locke & Key
rating.content: After their dad's murder, three siblings move with their mom to his ancestral estate, where they discover magical keys that unlock powers — and secrets.

rating.title: Little Things
rating.content: A cohabiting couple in their 20s navigate the ups and downs of work, modern-day relationships and finding themselves in contemporary Mumbai.

rating.title: Hometown Cha-Cha-Cha
rating.content: A big-city dentist opens up a practice in a close-knit seaside village, home to a charming jack-of-all-trades who is her polar opposite in every way.

rating.title: Never Have I Ever
rating.content: After a traumatic year, an Indian-American teen just wants to spruce up her social status — but friends, family and feelings won’t make it easy on her.

rating.title: Narcos
rating.content: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels fuels this gritty gangster drama series.

rating.title: Sacred Games
rating.content: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

rating.title: Suits
rating.content: When he impresses a big lawyer with his razor-sharp mind, a college dropout scores a coveted associate job, even though he has no legal credentials.
